product_name: SKS P45 Chromoplastic Longboard Fender Set
long_description: A lightweight set of full fenders that provide excellent coverage for keeping you dry while you ride, the P45 Chromoplastic Longboard Fender Set features unique construction for high durability. Chromoplastic material sandwiches very thin aluminum and copper foil, making it corrosion- and UV-resistant. Stainless-steel accessories are lightweight and durable. Secu-Clip attachment unclips automatically for safety when a foreign object lodges against the tire and fender. Easy assembly; mounting instructions included. For wheel sizes of 700C x 28 - 37mm.
short_description: A lightweight set of full fenders that provide excellent coverage for keeping you dry while you ride, the P45 Chromoplastic Longboard Fender Set features unique construction for high durability.
